title: Chilaloshade Hospital Management System
description: A comprehensive hospital management system for managing patients, staff, lab, pharmacy, billing, and administration.
longDescription: Developed a real-world Hospital Management System to digitize hospital workflows including patient registration, appointments, laboratory results, pharmacy management, billing, and role-based access for hospital staff. Designed with scalability and real hospital operations in mind.

title: Universal Clinic System
description: Clinic management system for handling appointments, patients, and medical records.
longDescription: Built a clinic management platform focused on appointment scheduling, patient records, and doctor workflows. Designed for small to medium clinics to manage daily operations digitally.

title: Home Service Platform
description: A service booking platform connecting customers with home service providers.
longDescription: Developed a home service application that allows users to request services such as maintenance and repairs. Focused on user-friendly booking, service listings, and provider management.

title: Exam AI Hub
description: An AI-assisted platform for exams, practice, and learning support.
longDescription: Built an AI-based educational platform designed to help students with exams and practice questions. The system focuses on intelligent assistance and improving learning efficiency.

title: Ping Pong Game
description: A simple interactive Ping Pong game built for learning and experimentation.
longDescription: Created a browser-based Ping Pong game focusing on game logic, animations, and user interaction. Built as a fun project to strengthen JavaScript and UI skills.

title: AI Doctor Appointment Platform
description: An AI-driven healthcare platform for booking doctor appointments intelligently.
longDescription: Worked on an AI-powered doctor appointment system that helps patients find suitable doctors and schedule appointments efficiently. Focused on healthcare workflows, intelligent matching, and scalable system design.

title: Tour and Travel Website
description: A travel website showcasing destinations and travel services.
longDescription: Developed a tour and travel website to present destinations, travel packages, and services with a clean and attractive UI.

title: News Website
description: A news application that displays current news articles.
longDescription: Built a news web application that fetches and displays news content in an organized and readable format.

title: E-Commerce Platform

longDescription: Built a complete e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, shopping cart, product management, and payment integration. Designed with real-world business flow in mind.
